modName: Listen To The Birds - No Ambient Sounds
summary: Removes ambient bird noises. Intended for use with SkyBirds, so only spawned birds are heard.
descriptionHtml:
-----------------
Description
-----------------

Removes ambient bird chirps attached to trees. Intended for SkyBirds users who only want to hear birds that are actually spawned into the world, or bird-haters that don't want to hear birds.

I'm a SkyBirds user who got really frustrated by all the ambient bird calls that were distracting me from locating birds spawned by Skybirds, so I removed the ambient sounds! I'm pretty sure I got all of them, and I know that I didn't touch any sounds besides bird calls. Let me know if I missed any sounds in the comments. Thanks for downloading!

-------------------------
Install
-------------------------

Use NMM

OR

Extract the .rar into your ...Skyrim/Data folder.

--------------------
Compatibility
--------------------

Should be compatible with everything. Definitely works alongside SkyBirds, and improves the bird-watching experience.

There may be other ambient sounds in new worldspaces added by DLC, or other mods that decided to add new ambient bird calls. This mod will not remove those, unless they rely on the vanilla sound files.

-------------------------------
Recommended Mods
-------------------------------

SkyBirds - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods//23771

-----------
Credits
-----------

.esp files made by Dudeman325

You do not have the rights to distribute this file in any way. This link on the Nexus will be the only way to download it. That's my decision until I decide otherwise.
author: Dudeman325
